channel.title: 2007Rebels PvP/Eco/Pvm/Skilling
channel.description:
[img]http://2007rebels.com/img/logo.png[/img] Website: http://2007rebels.com/ Client: http://2007rebels.com/jars/2007Rebels.jar
[size=12pt][b]We're a brand new server that has great pvp, great eco, pvming and skilling and we have osrs content. You can level up combat stats by clicking on your skills but everything else you have to train.[/b][/size]
[size=18pt][u][b]Features[/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li]Clicking on combat skills to level it up to what ever you desire.[/li] [li]2 Pk point reward and 325k cash reward for each kill. (farming is patched)[/li] [li]Highly edited combat system, very good max hit formulas, and good switching for hybrids.[/li] [li]All special attacks work for melee weapons and ranged weapons and including all specials with their special abilities just like runescape![/li][li]Special attack is restored when you kill someone (non-repeated kills)[/li] [li]All 21 skills are working and trainable.[/li] [li]We have 10+ bosses to fight (more coming soon)[/li] [li]Great donator benefits and options to purchase![/li] [li]We have osrs items and npc's.[/li] [li]Skilling zone for skillers[/li] [li]Working slayer helm with effects for slayer. Gives extra exp and extra 5 slayer points each task completed.[/li] [li]An exclusive Pk point shop that is updated weekly with new and different items[/li] [li]We have Mac banning and uid banning.[/li] [li]Very friendly community and great staff who are there to help you 24/7.[/li] [li]Many more to post but no time, come check it out :D[/li][/ul]
[u][b][size=18pt]Media[/size][/b][/u] [spoiler][img]http://i.gyazo.com/4e027df381aa4def4d4688184249e08f.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/d07d49eae09bc49bd0441cfe5edb82da.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/63eefbf64219abfa934888a0c7591fae.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e8436634e8514555e0c3f35d87ffd2df.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/75c57a0919d3585b82aac15f96733269.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/430c892009afe92ef5739ccd6936c3fa.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/292932e46bbdb43a1d01501ea4aa1863.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/521e83a3a7824fda33cd7c0998f1c550.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/b78c40155aa8ff1995410e33f375ee74.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/ff1e19ca637ffd1ff5850ce1d45ad4d9.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a031d1776fcb6c712757d2c29b19bb4d.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/62a1cdd69872e4c4b457969e59853b62.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/747058ecd8459dbe1362e4758c7542df.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/cd21848b0c0d4542eefbd513ecbbad75.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/570197331c8c29d9f818ccd7faf96783.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/c6c4263b95fd38bc7d0bf22dcd937a06.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8cb2b7a2183ab2731797d3bb83603634.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8db271f0bd8b4a980298fc8bdc15e4f2.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5362eed781564fe489a77f833c53afb2.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/bc0ea562853d6cb5b2bc1de83699582c.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/6bd1f37ff353d09e57f2c3486f852ab4.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/d24efa3d49478019202cf4242c8b957b.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8611462d8236de17c06ff6a3974c5b37.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/27cac1b580e5453ca50fca03980f3784.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1ebb3ec83d971a4f33ad843f2415517e.gif[/img] [/spoiler]
[b][size=12pt]Here's a pk video uploaded by our moderator Minadoi:[/size][/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DBifrj_o1uw[/youtube]

item.title: 2007Rebels PvP/Eco/Pvm/Skilling
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:


Website: http://2007rebels.com/
Client: http://2007rebels.com/jars/2007Rebels.jar

[size=12pt]We’re a brand new server that has great pvp, great eco, pvming and skilling and we have osrs content. You can level up combat stats by clicking on your skills but everything else you have to train.[/size]

[size=18pt]Features[/size]

[ul][li]Clicking on combat skills to level it up to what ever you desire.[/li]
[li]2 Pk point reward and 325k cash reward for each kill. (farming is patched)[/li]
[li]Highly edited combat system, very good max hit formulas, and good switching for hybrids.[/li]
[li]All special attacks work for melee weapons and ranged weapons and including all specials with their special abilities just like runescape![/li][li]Special attack is restored when you kill someone (non-repeated kills)[/li]
[li]All 21 skills are working and trainable.[/li]
[li]We have 10+ bosses to fight (more coming soon)[/li]
[li]Great donator benefits and options to purchase![/li]
[li]We have osrs items and npc’s.[/li]
[li]Skilling zone for skillers[/li]
[li]Working slayer helm with effects for slayer. Gives extra exp and extra 5 slayer points each task completed.[/li]
[li]An exclusive Pk point shop that is updated weekly with new and different items[/li]
[li]We have Mac banning and uid banning.[/li]
[li]Very friendly community and great staff who are there to help you 24/7.[/li]
[li]Many more to post but no time, come check it out :D[/li][/ul]

[size=18pt]Media[/size]
[spoiler]
























[/spoiler]

[size=12pt]Here’s a pk video uploaded by our moderator Minadoi:[/size]
